title: Virtual World Science English Communication Competency Enhancement Program (VW-STEM)

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of Basic Scientific Terminology and Proficiency in Middle School-Level English
context.additional_context: Science professionals require developing competencies to perform English-language professional communication in virtual world environments.

learning_goals: Perform science-related English communication with over 80% accuracy in virtual lab scenarios.
Actively participate at least three times in English discussions with peer learners during VR-based collaborative tasks.
Write and present project reports utilizing over 200 specialized science terminology terms.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
